NFQL

Evaluation of Ruleset Lengths at Runtime

11 June 2012

Previously a JSON query also described the number of rules contained in the rulesets that followed. Since JSON is based on Javascript Objects there is a possibility to let the engine calculate the length of the array at runtime.

{
  "branchset": [
    "num_branches": 2
    {
      "filter": {
        "num_rules": 2,
        "ruleset": [...]
      },
    ...
}]}

A similar JSON query is condensed to now look like:

{
  "branchset": [
    {
      "filter": {
        "ruleset": [...]
      },
  ...
}]}
